description:
A pack for four seasons – with the safety bonus of a Recco reflector that's detectable by search and rescue teams. It's a classic, simple design with a spacious main compartment and padded shoulder straps for hiking comfort. Made of burly, coated fabrics to handle hard use and 24-litres of heavy stuff.

  • Rugged construction combines 420 nylon and 200-denier recycled polyester for great durability
  • Clamshell zipper with oversized glove-friendly pull loops
  • Padded back and shoulder straps have breathable airmesh on the inner side
  • Adjustable sternum strap takes the tension off your shoulders
  • 10mm bar-tacked webbing lets you clip on a carabiner
  • Top accessory pocket with a key clip keeps personal items secure
  • Buckled compression straps reduce pack volume
  • Two side stretch pockets hold a thermos or umbrella
  • Hydration sleeve with hangar and hose port
  • Webbing loops let you attach poles or tools
  • Recco® reflector is detectable by ski patrols and search and rescue teams
name: MEC Trail 24 Daypack - Unisex
